languages.text: "В общем, шерин, я на своей шкуре испытала то, что болтают ваши офицеры — что в присутствии взволнованной Орселлио любой несчастный теряет голову и становится охвачен ажи. Ох, и неприятно же это... помню только, что забились все по углам и верещали как сирены сигнальные. Ну а Кассия... Кассия, кажется, была смущена состоянием наших одежд, которые, как вы понимаете, были весьма скудны в тот момент. Не успела я в себя прийти, как бедняжки уже и след простыл. Вышло, право, неловко... А прибить я обещала одну из девок, которую, на свою беду, сама же зазвала: эта кассха под шумок увела у меня набитый кисет отменного {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}лхо{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: "В общем, шерин, я на своей шкуре испытала то, что болтают ваши офицеры — что в присутствии взволнованной Орселлио любой несчастный теряет голову и становится охвачен ажи. Ох, и неприятно же это... помню только, что забились все по углам и верещали как сирены сигнальные. Ну а Кассия... Кассия, кажется, была смущена состоянием наших одежд, которые, как вы понимаете, были весьма скудны в тот момент. Не успела я в себя прийти, как бедняжки уже и след простыл. Вышло, право, неловко... А прибить я обещала одну из девок, которую, на свою беду, сама же зазвала: эта кассха под шумок увела у меня набитый кисет отменного {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}лхо{/g}!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Long story short, shereen, I had the misfortune of getting a taste of what your officers have been going on about — they say when the Orsellio girl becomes upset, everyone in the vicinity loses their minds and is overtaken by azhi. And it hurt like anything... I can only remember everyone huddling in a corner, wailing like klaxons. As for Cassia... I think Cassia was flustered by the state of our clothes, which were very meagre back then, as you understand. Before I could get my bearings, the poor thing was gone. The whole situation was awkward... As for the threats, they were addressed to one of the girls I'd been foolish enough to invite to our little party. That kaskha used the confusion to pilfer a full pouch of {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} from under my nose!"
languages.original_text: "В общем, шерин, я на своей шкуре испытала то, что болтают ваши офицеры — что в присутствии взволнованной Орселлио любой несчастный теряет голову и становится охвачен ажи. Ох, и неприятно же это... помню только, что забились все по углам и верещали как сирены сигнальные. Ну а Кассия... Кассия, кажется, была смущена состоянием наших одежд, которые, как вы понимаете, были весьма скудны в тот момент. Не успела я в себя прийти, как бедняжки уже и след простыл. Вышло, право, неловко... А прибить я обещала одну из девок, которую, на свою беду, сама же зазвала: эта кассха под шумок увела у меня набитый кисет отменного {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}лхо{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: "Long story short, shereen, I had the misfortune to feel what your officers have been babbling about — they say when the Orsellio girl becomes upset, everyone close lose their minds and are overtaken by daevas. Oh, that hurt quite a lot... I can only remember everyone huddling in a corner, wailing like klaxons. As for Cassia... I think Cassia was flustered by the state of our clothes, which were very meager back then, as you understand. Before I could get my bearings, the poor dear was gone. The entire situation was awkward... As for the threats, they were addressed to one of the slatterns who I had been foolish enough to invite to our little party. That kassha used the confusion to pilfer a full pouch of lho from under my nose!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

And it hurt like anything... I can only remember everyone huddling in a corner, wailing like klaxons. As for Cassia... The whole situation was awkward... As for the threats, they were addressed to one of the girls I'd been foolish enough to invite to our little party. That kassha used the confusion to pilfer a full pouch of {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} from under my nose!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “总之长话短说，亲爱的。很不幸，我体会到了你的军官一直在谈论的那些事情。他们说，当那个奥赛罗家族的姑娘不开心的时候，周围每个人都会失去理智，被鬼怪上身。那样的痛苦根本没办法用语言描述……我只记得，当时每个人都蜷缩在角落里，哭的像坏了的电喇叭一样。至于卡西娅……我猜，她被我们衣衫不整的样子吓坏了，你肯定也能想象得到。我们还没搞清楚到底发生了什么事情，那个可怜的小姑娘就跑了。当时的情况非常尴尬……至于那些威胁的话，是吼给参加聚会的某个姑娘听的。是我太蠢了，我邀请她也参加了聚会，结果那个小贱人趁着当时一片混乱，从我眼皮底下偷走了整整一袋{g|Encyclopedia:Lho}麻烟{/g}！”
languages.original_text: "Long story short, shereen, I had the misfortune of getting a taste of what your officers have been going on about — they say when the Orsellio girl becomes upset, everyone in the vicinity loses their minds and is overtaken by azhi. And it hurt like anything... I can only remember everyone huddling in a corner, wailing like klaxons. As for Cassia... I think Cassia was flustered by the state of our clothes, which were very meagre back then, as you understand. Before I could get my bearings, the poor thing was gone. The whole situation was awkward... As for the threats, they were addressed to one of the girls I'd been foolish enough to invite to our little party. That kassha used the confusion to pilfer a full pouch of {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} from under my nose!"

traits.locale_text: “总之长话短说，亲爱的。很不幸，我体会到了你的军官一直在谈论的那些事情。他们说，当那个奥塞罗家族的姑娘不开心的时候，周围每个人都会失去理智，被鬼怪上身。那样的痛苦根本没办法用语言描述……我只记得，当时每个人都蜷缩在角落里，哭的像坏了的电喇叭一样。至于卡西娅……我猜，她被我们衣衫不整的样子吓坏了，你肯定也能想象得到。我们还没搞清楚到底发生了什么事情，那个可怜的小姑娘就跑了。当时的情况非常尴尬……至于那些威胁的话，是吼给参加聚会的某个姑娘听的。是我太蠢了，我邀请她也参加了聚会，结果那个小贱人趁着当时一片混乱，从我眼皮底下偷走了整整一袋{g|Encyclopedia:Lho}麻烟{/g}！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Long story short, shereen, I had the misfortune of getting a taste of what your officers have been going on about — they say when the Orsellio girl becomes upset, everyone in the vicinity loses their minds and is overtaken by azhi. And it hurt like anything... I can only remember everyone huddling in a corner, wailing like klaxons. As for Cassia... I think Cassia was flustered by the state of our clothes, which were very meagre back then, as you understand. Before I could get my bearings, the poor thing was gone. The whole situation was awkward... As for the threats, they were addressed to one of the girls I'd been foolish enough to invite to our little party. That kassha used the confusion to pilfer a full pouch of lho from under my nose!"

languages.text: «En resumidas cuentas, shereen, tuve la mala suerte de experimentar lo que sus oficiales llevan tiempo comentando: que, cuando la chica de los Orsellio se enfada, todos los que estén por la zona se vuelven locos y los consumen los azhi. Y ni se imagina lo que duele... solo recuerdo a todo el mundo apiñado en una esquina, chillando como bocinas. En cuanto a Cassia... creo que se puso nerviosa al ver nuestra ropa, que, como comprenderá, no estaba muy entera. Antes de que me pudiera recuperar, la pobre había huido. Fue una situación incómoda... Respecto a las amenazas, eran para una de las chicas que fui lo bastante idiota como para invitar a nuestra fiestecita. ¡La muy kaskha aprovechó la confusión para robar un saco de {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} delante de mis narices!».
languages.original_text: "Long story short, shereen, I had the misfortune of getting a taste of what your officers have been going on about — they say when the Orsellio girl becomes upset, everyone in the vicinity loses their minds and is overtaken by azhi. And it hurt like anything... I can only remember everyone huddling in a corner, wailing like klaxons. As for Cassia... I think Cassia was flustered by the state of our clothes, which were very meagre back then, as you understand. Before I could get my bearings, the poor thing was gone. The whole situation was awkward... As for the threats, they were addressed to one of the girls I'd been foolish enough to invite to our little party. That kaskha used the confusion to pilfer a full pouch of {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} from under my nose!"

traits.locale_text: «En resumidas cuentas, shereen, tuve la mala suerte de experimentar lo que sus oficiales llevan tiempo comentando: que, cuando la chica de los Orsellio se enfada, todos los que estén por la zona se vuelven locos y los consumen los azhi. Y ni se imagina lo que duele... solo recuerdo a todo el mundo apiñado en una esquina, chillando como bocinas. En cuanto a Cassia... creo que se puso nerviosa al ver nuestra ropa, que, como comprenderá, no estaba muy entera. Antes de que me pudiera recuperar, la pobre había huido. Fue una situación incómoda... Respecto a las amenazas, eran para una de las chicas que fui lo bastante idiota como para invitar a nuestra fiestecita. ¡La muy kassha aprovechó la confusión para robar un saco de {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} delante de mis narices!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「手短に話すとさ、アタシは不運にも、アンタの将校たちが何をしようとしているのかを知ることになったのさ…オーセリオの少女が動揺すると、近くにいる全員が正気を失い、アジーに支配されてしまうそうじゃないか。そして、それは何にもまして痛かった…みんなが隅っこにうずくまって、クラクションのように泣き叫んでいたのを覚えている。カシアはというと…彼女はアタシたちの服の状態に慌てたと思う。知っての通り、当時は酷い有様だったからね。アタシが状況を把握する前に、カシアはいなくなってしまった。全体的に気まずい状況だった…脅しに関しては、アタシが愚かにも小さなパーティーに招待した女の子の一人に宛てたものだった。その子はというと、混乱に乗じてアタシの鼻先から{g|Encyclopedia:Lho}ルホ{/g}を一袋盗んでいったんだ！」
languages.original_text: "Long story short, shereen, I had the misfortune of getting a taste of what your officers have been going on about — they say when the Orsellio girl becomes upset, everyone in the vicinity loses their minds and is overtaken by azhi. And it hurt like anything... I can only remember everyone huddling in a corner, wailing like klaxons. As for Cassia... I think Cassia was flustered by the state of our clothes, which were very meagre back then, as you understand. Before I could get my bearings, the poor thing was gone. The whole situation was awkward... As for the threats, they were addressed to one of the girls I'd been foolish enough to invite to our little party. That kassha used the confusion to pilfer a full pouch of {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} from under my nose!"

traits.locale_text: 「手短に話すとさ、アタシは不運にも、アンタの将校たちが何をしようとしているのかを知ることになったのさ…オーセリオの少女が動揺すると、近くにいる全員が正気を失い、アジーに支配されてしまうそうじゃないか。そして、それは何にもまして痛かった…みんなが隅っこにうずくまって、クラクションのように泣き叫んでいたのを覚えている。カシアはというと…彼女はアタシたちの服の状態に慌てたと思う。知っての通り、当時は酷い有様だったからね。アタシが状況を把握する前に、カシアはいなくなってしまった。全体的に気まずい状況だった…脅しに関しては、アタシが愚かにも小さなパーティーに招待した女の子の一人に宛てたものだった。その子はというと、混乱に乗じてアタシの鼻先から{g|Encyclopedia:Lho}アイホ{/g}を一袋盗んでいったんだ！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Kurz gesagt, Shereen, hatte ich das Pech, eine Kostprobe von den Geschehnissen zu bekommen, von denen Eure Offiziere sprechen. Wenn die Junge Orsellio sich aufregt, so heißt es, verlieren alle in der Umgebung den Verstand und werden von Azhi besessen. Und es hat fürchterlich wehgetan ... Ich erinnere mich nur noch, dass alle in einer Ecke kauerten und wie die Sirenen jaulten. Und was Cassia angeht ... Ich glaube, Cassia war vom Zustand unserer Kleidung irritiert, die damals sehr notdürftig waren, wenn Ihr versteht. Bevor ich die Orientierung zurückgewinnen konnte, war das arme Ding schon wieder verschwunden. Die ganze Situation war äußerst unangenehm ... Und was die Drohungen angeht, die galten einem der Mädchen, die ich törichterweise zu unserer kleinen Party eingeladen hatte. Diese Kaskha nutzte die allgemeine Verwirrung, um einen ganzen Beutel {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}Lho{/g} direkt unter meiner Nase wegzustibitzen!"
languages.original_text: "Long story short, shereen, I had the misfortune of getting a taste of what your officers have been going on about — they say when the Orsellio girl becomes upset, everyone in the vicinity loses their minds and is overtaken by azhi. And it hurt like anything... I can only remember everyone huddling in a corner, wailing like klaxons. As for Cassia... I think Cassia was flustered by the state of our clothes, which were very meagre back then, as you understand. Before I could get my bearings, the poor thing was gone. The whole situation was awkward... As for the threats, they were addressed to one of the girls I'd been foolish enough to invite to our little party. That kaskha used the confusion to pilfer a full pouch of {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} from under my nose!"

traits.locale_text: "Kurz gesagt, Shereen, hatte ich das Pech, eine Kostprobe von den Geschehnissen zu bekommen, von denen Eure Offiziere sprechen. Wenn die Junge Orsellio sich aufregt, so heißt es, verlieren alle in der Umgebung den Verstand und werden von Azhi besessen. Und es hat fürchterlich wehgetan ... Ich erinnere mich nur noch, dass alle in einer Ecke kauerten und wie die Sirenen jaulten. Und was Cassia angeht ... Ich glaube, Cassia war vom Zustand unserer Kleidung irritiert, die damals sehr notdürftig waren, wenn Ihr versteht. Bevor ich die Orientierung zurückgewinnen konnte, war das arme Ding schon wieder verschwunden. Die ganze Situation war äußerst unangenehm ... Und was die Drohungen angeht, die galten einem der Mädchen, die ich törichterweise zu unserer kleinen Party eingeladen hatte. Diese Kassha nutzte die allgemeine Verwirrung, um einen ganzen Beutel {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}Lho{/g} direkt unter meiner Nase wegzustibitzen!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « En bref, shereen, j'ai eu le malheur d'être témoin du phénomène dont vos officiers parlaient : ils disent que quand mademoiselle Orsellio s'énerve, tous ceux qui se trouvent à proximité sont submergés par les azhi et perdent l'esprit. C'est la vérité, et je peux vous dire que ça fait un mal de chien. Tout ce dont je me souviens, c'est que nous étions tous recroquevillés dans un coin, en train de hurler comme des sirènes. Quant à Cassia... je pense que c'est notre état de nudité relativement avancée qui l'a troublée. Avant que j'aie le temps de me ressaisir, la pauvre enfant avait disparu. C'est une situation est extrêmement gênante pour tout le monde... Pour ce qui est des menaces, elles étaient adressées à l'une des filles que j'avais eu la bêtise d'inviter à notre petite sauterie. Cette kaskha a profité de la confusion pour voler un sac entier de {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} juste sous mon nez ! »
languages.original_text: "Long story short, shereen, I had the misfortune of getting a taste of what your officers have been going on about — they say when the Orsellio girl becomes upset, everyone in the vicinity loses their minds and is overtaken by azhi. And it hurt like anything... I can only remember everyone huddling in a corner, wailing like klaxons. As for Cassia... I think Cassia was flustered by the state of our clothes, which were very meagre back then, as you understand. Before I could get my bearings, the poor thing was gone. The whole situation was awkward... As for the threats, they were addressed to one of the girls I'd been foolish enough to invite to our little party. That kaskha used the confusion to pilfer a full pouch of {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} from under my nose!"

traits.locale_text: « En bref, shereen, j'ai eu le malheur d'être témoin du phénomène dont vos officiers parlaient : ils disent que quand mademoiselle Orsellio s'énerve, tous ceux qui se trouvent à proximité sont submergés par les azhi et perdent l'esprit. C'est la vérité, et je peux vous dire que ça fait un mal de chien. Tout ce dont je me souviens, c'est que nous étions tous recroquevillés dans un coin, en train de hurler comme des sirènes. Quant à Cassia... je pense que c'est notre état de nudité relativement avancée qui l'a troublée. Avant que j'aie le temps de me ressaisir, la pauvre enfant avait disparu. C'est une situation est extrêmement gênante pour tout le monde... Pour ce qui est des menaces, elles étaient adressées à l'une des filles que j'avais eu la bêtise d'inviter à notre petite sauterie. Cette kassha a profité de la confusion pour voler un sac entier de {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} juste sous mon nez ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Uzun lafın kısası şirinim, subaylarının sürekli şikâyet ettiği şeyi bizzat deneyimleme talihsizliğini yaşadım. Orsellio kızı üzüldüğünde etraftaki herkesin aklını yitirdiğini ve içlerine azhi kaçtığını söylüyorlardı. Ne kadar acı verici olduğunu anlatamam. Tek hatırlayabildiğim, herkesin bir köşede iki büklüm olduğu ve klaksonlar gibi inlediği. Cassia ise... Sanıyorum o, tahmin edebileceğin üzere kıyafetsizliğimize öfkelendi. Zavallı şey, ben daha kendime gelemeden gitmişti. Genel olarak çok nahoş bir tecrübeydi. Tehditlerse küçük partimize davet etme ahmaklığında bulunduğum kızlardan birineydi. Kaşka, kargaşadan faydalanıp burnumun dibinden koca bir kese {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}liho{/g} yürüttü yani!"
languages.original_text: "Long story short, shereen, I had the misfortune of getting a taste of what your officers have been going on about — they say when the Orsellio girl becomes upset, everyone in the vicinity loses their minds and is overtaken by azhi. And it hurt like anything... I can only remember everyone huddling in a corner, wailing like klaxons. As for Cassia... I think Cassia was flustered by the state of our clothes, which were very meagre back then, as you understand. Before I could get my bearings, the poor thing was gone. The whole situation was awkward... As for the threats, they were addressed to one of the girls I'd been foolish enough to invite to our little party. That kaskha used the confusion to pilfer a full pouch of {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} from under my nose!"
